posts.post_title: Gorgeous T206 Harry Hinchman SGC 50 looks EXMT+
posts.post_content:
Posted By: scott brockelman
Gonna try this again on the correct page.

I have a newly acquired T206 card of Harry Hinchman, Toledo. SGC 50 but appears much nicer! the only flaw I can find is a small flake on the left back border. Classic case of buy the card not the holder. 

$75 delivered 

Scott
